string.name: dev/version
string.value: Preferred app version number differs from the version trying to load.

string.name: dev/version/solution
string.value: The search does not support the version preferred for application '%%'.

string.name: dev/support
string.value: Search does not support the given app version for app '%%' major version '%%'.

string.name: dev/support/solution
string.value: Try to load the interface that the search app supports.
